mapper.select: SELECT tpn.uid uid, mb_uid, username, subject, content, viewCnt, tpn.regDate regDate FROM (t_post_notice tpn JOIN t_member tm ON tpn.mb_uid = tm.uid) ORDER BY uid DESC;
SELECT tpn.uid uid, mb_uid, username, subject, content, viewCnt, tpn.regDate regDate FROM (t_post_notice tpn JOIN t_member tm ON tpn.mb_uid = tm.uid) WHERE tpn.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_post_notice (mb_uid, subject, content) VALUES (#{mb_uid}, #{subject}, #{content})
